name: Home Dashboard Screen
description: Data-rich welcoming hub with real-time updates, KPI metrics, revenue charts, smart tiles, activity feed, and AI insights

name: Inbox List View Screen
description: Unified messaging hub displaying all SMS, WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, and Email messages with channel filters, search, and smart sorting

name: Conversation Thread View Screen
description: Individual message thread showing chronological conversation history with rich media, AI responses, and message composer

name: Jobs List View Screen
description: Visual job pipeline showing all jobs with status tracking, filters, search, and quick actions in list or kanban view

name: Job Detail View Screen
description: Comprehensive job view with timeline, communications, media gallery, notes, and action buttons

name: Calendar Grid View Screen
description: Interactive calendar with day/week/month views, event dots, drag-drop rescheduling, and booking list

name: Money Dashboard Screen
description: Financial overview with balance, metrics, revenue chart, transaction history, and payment actions

name: AI Receptionist Configuration Screen
description: Configure AI auto-reply settings, tone, business hours, FAQs, and view AI performance metrics

name: Reports & Analytics Dashboard
description: Analytics dashboard with conversion funnel, lead source analysis, revenue trends, team performance, and AI insights

name: Settings Home Screen
description: Main settings hub with organization profile, team management, integrations, notifications, and preferences

name: Contact List View Screen
description: Contact and CRM list with search, filters, stage indicators, lead scores, and quick actions

name: Contact Detail View Screen
description: Detailed contact profile with timeline, notes, custom fields, relationships, and suggested actions

name: Campaign List Screen
description: Marketing campaign manager showing email, SMS, and multichannel campaigns with status and metrics

name: Campaign Builder Screen
description: Multi-step wizard for creating campaigns with type selection, content editor, audience targeting, and scheduling

name: Campaign Analytics Screen
description: Campaign performance metrics with opens, clicks, conversions, device breakdown, and link heatmap

name: FrostedContainer
description: Reusable glassmorphism container with backdrop blur, gradient, and border for translucent surfaces

name: SkeletonLoader
description: Animated shimmer loading placeholder for content during data fetch with various patterns (card, text, avatar, button, chart)

name: Toast / Snackbar
description: Brief feedback message for success, error, info, warning with auto-dismiss and swipe-to-dismiss

name: Badge
description: Numeric indicators, status markers, and dots for unread counts, notifications, and labels with variants (count, dot, status)

name: Chip
description: Compact selectable/removable tags for filters, tags, and multi-select with states (default, selected, disabled, closeable)

name: Tooltip
description: Contextual help on hover/long-press for icon buttons, truncated text, and complex features

name: EmptyStateCard
description: Placeholder for empty lists with illustration, headline, description, and CTA button

name: ErrorStateCard
description: Error display with icon, message, error code, and retry action for network failures and data errors

name: PullToRefresh
description: Manual data refresh gesture for scrollable lists with visual feedback and haptic

name: SwipeAction
description: Quick actions via swipe gesture for messages, jobs, bookings with left/right reveal and haptic feedback

name: ConfirmationDialog
description: Action confirmation modal for delete, cancel, and critical actions with icon, title, description, and button actions

name: BottomSheet
description: Slide-up panel for actions/forms with frosted glass, drag handle, and height variants (quarter, half, three-quarter, full)

name: ContextMenu
description: Long-press action menu for list items with frosted glass panel and item states

name: SearchBar
description: Global search input with expand/collapse animation, recent searches, and clear button

name: SegmentedControl
description: Tab-like toggle between 2-5 views for view mode switches and filters

name: ProgressBar
description: Linear progress indicator (determinate/indeterminate) for file uploads and multi-step forms

name: LoadingSpinner
description: Circular progress spinner (small, medium, large) for buttons, inline actions, page loads

name: Avatar
description: User/contact profile image with badge support in small, medium, large sizes

name: FAB (Floating Action Button)
description: Primary screen action button with extended label option (default, extended, mini)

name: InfoBanner
description: Contextual information strip for announcements, warnings, success, promo at top of screens

name: ChatBubble
description: Message bubble for inbound/outbound messages with avatar, timestamp, read receipt, and status indicator

name: MessageComposerBar
description: Bottom input bar with attachments, payment, AI reply buttons, character counter, and send button

name: ChannelIconBadge
description: Channel logo badge (SMS, WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, Email) with tooltip

name: TypingIndicator
description: Animated dots showing contact is typing

name: ReadReceiptIcon
description: Check marks (single/double) showing delivery and read status

name: VoiceNotePlayer
description: Inline audio player with waveform visualization and playback controls

name: LinkPreviewCard
description: Rich preview of URLs sent in messages with thumbnail and metadata

name: JobCard
description: Compact job card with client name, title, status, date, quick actions, and swipe gestures

name: ProgressPill
description: Inline progress indicator showing job completion stage (Lead → Quote → Booked → Complete) with color coding

name: JobTimelineRow
description: Event row with avatar, action description, timestamp, and expandable details

name: StatusChip
description: Color-coded chip showing current job status with icon

name: CalendarWidget
description: Month/week/day grid with event dots, color-coded by status, drag-to-create, pinch-to-zoom

name: BookingCard
description: Card with client, service, time, status, and quick actions (call, navigate, reschedule)

name: TimeSlotPicker
description: Visual time slot selector with availability shading

name: BalanceCard
description: Large card showing current balance, pending, and received amounts with visual breakdown

name: RevenueChart
description: Line/bar/pie chart showing revenue trends over time with interactive tooltips

name: PaymentTile
description: Transaction row with client, amount, status, date, and tap to expand

name: InvoiceCard
description: Invoice summary with client, items, total, status, and quick actions (send, view, edit)

name: PaymentStatusBadge
description: Color-coded badge showing payment status (paid/pending/overdue/refunded) with icon

name: AIReceptionistThread
description: Simulated chat showing AI receptionist conversation with typing animation, message bubbles, and realistic timing

name: AIPerformanceChart
description: Line/bar chart showing AI response rate, satisfaction, and booking conversion

name: FAQCard
description: Expandable card with question, answer, edit/delete actions, and swipe gestures

name: ContactCard
description: List item showing contact summary with avatar, name, stage, score, and last contacted time

name: ContactProfileCard
description: Header with photo, name, key details, edit button, and show actions

name: StageProgressBar
description: Visual stage progression indicator showing current stage of total with interactive/read-only modes

name: ScoreIndicator
description: Lead score badge with color coding (hot/warm/cold) and classification

name: ScoreBreakdownCard
description: Detailed score breakdown showing factors contributing to lead score with progress bars

name: TimelineView
description: Chronological activity feed with filters, load more, and infinite scroll

name: CampaignCard
description: Campaign list item with name, type, status, sent count, and metrics summary

name: EmailComposer
description: Rich email editor with WYSIWYG, content blocks, merge fields, and desktop/mobile preview toggle

name: SMSComposer
description: SMS text editor with character counter, link shortener, emoji picker, and preview pane

name: AudienceSelector
description: Select target segments with live count preview, exclusion lists, and filter builder

name: LinkHeatmap
description: Clickable heatmap of email showing click counts per link with interactive tooltips

name: ConversionFunnel
description: Multi-step conversion visualization showing drop-off at each stage with percentages

name: Create Job Flow
description: User flow for creating a new job from scratch, from Inbox conversation, or from booking with AI-extracted details

name: Send Invoice Flow
description: User flow for creating, previewing, and sending an invoice with payment link via email/SMS

name: Book Appointment Flow
description: User flow for creating a booking with service selection, time slot picking, and confirmation

name: AI Receptionist Setup Flow
description: User flow for configuring AI auto-reply with tone, hours, FAQs, and testing before activation

name: Request Review Flow
description: User flow for requesting a review after job completion via SMS/email with direct review links

name: Primary Teal Color
description: Primary brand color #00C6A2 used for buttons, accents, links, and highlights

name: Secondary Accent Color
description: Secondary accent color #00DDB0 used in gradients and highlights

name: Background Gradient
description: Subtle diagonal ambient gradient from #FFFFFF → #F6FAF8 (light) or #0B0D0D → #131516 (dark)

name: Surface Opacity
description: Glass layer opacity 0.88 (light) / 0.78 (dark) for frosted surfaces

name: Blur Strength
description: Backdrop blur sigma 24px (light) / 26px (dark) for glassmorphism effect

name: Border Radius
description: Corner radius 20px (cards), 16px (buttons), 28px (modals) for premium rounded surfaces

name: Shadow
description: Box shadow rgba(0,0,0,0.06) light / rgba(0,0,0,0.25) dark for depth and elevation

name: SF Pro Display/Text Typography
description: Primary typeface system with sizes from Display XL (40px) to Caption (12px) with specific weights and letter-spacing

name: Transition Duration
description: Standard transition duration 250ms for button/hover animations with easeOutQuart curve

name: Haptic Feedback Levels
description: Haptic feedback levels (light, medium, heavy, success, warning) for iOS/Android touch responses

name: Omni-Inbox Unified Messaging
description: Unified messaging hub for SMS, WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, Email with threading, internal notes, AI summarization, and lead source tagging

name: AI Receptionist Auto-Reply
description: Automated 24/7 first-response system with missed call text-back, FAQ responses, booking assistance, lead qualification, and tone customization

name: Job Lifecycle Management
description: Complete job tracking from quote to completion with timeline, photos, notes, time tracking, and review requests

name: Calendar & Booking System
description: Unified scheduling with day/week/month views, online booking portal, 2-way calendar sync, reminders, and 'On My Way' ETA messages

name: Invoicing & Payment Processing
description: Automated invoicing with Stripe integration, payment links, recurring billing, overdue reminders, and refunds

name: Contact & CRM Management
description: Full contact lifecycle with stages, lead scoring, activity timeline, segmentation, duplicate detection, and bulk import/export

name: Marketing Campaign Builder
description: Email, SMS, and multichannel campaigns with visual editor, audience targeting, A/B testing, and analytics

name: Reports & Analytics Dashboard
description: Business analytics with conversion funnel, lead source analysis, revenue trends, team performance, and AI insights
